slide1.text: Welcome to the Product and Services Network Map. The map shows some of our most popular products, organised by portfolio and family type.

slide2.text: Explore the map to discover more about what the products do, how they work and the benefits they offer our clients.

slide3.text: You’ll also score points for each product Challenge you complete along the way. These challenges will test your knowledge and make sure you’re ready to face the Client Proposals.
